short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A delightful browser extension designed to transform your new tab experience into a virtual garden of tranquility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're a nature enthusiast, seeking inspiration, or simply looking to add a touch of freshness to your online routine, Flower Finder provides a diverse bouquet of flowers to uplift your spirits. Additionally, Flower Finder will show you the current date and time in a beautiful analog-style clock and allow you to jot down quick notes and reminders directly in the new tab, creating a seamless way to capture thoughts or important tasks.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Flower Finder extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://flowers.namessystems.com/tcs and Privacy Policy at https://flowers.namessystems.com/privacy-policy. Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

*All images are sourced from Unsplash. Each image is credited at the bottom right of the new tab, and by clicking on the photo credit users will be redirected to Unsplash where they can download the image in question.
